name: ListAccessGroupProjects
description:
Retrieve a list of projects for a given access group.

This tool should be called to obtain a list of projects associated with a specific access group by providing the group ID or name.

parameters.name: access_group_identifier
parameters.description: The ID or name of the Access Group to list its projects.

value_schema.description: The ID or name of the Access Group.

parameters.name: max_project_count
parameters.description: Maximum number of access group projects to return. Must be an integer.

value_schema.description: Limit how many access group projects should be returned.

parameters.name: continuation_cursor
parameters.description: The continuation cursor used to retrieve the next page of results in a paginated response.

value_schema.description: Continuation cursor to retrieve the next page of results.

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the team to perform the request on behalf of. This specifies which team's access group projects to list.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The slug of the team to perform the request on behalf of. Specify to filter projects by team.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit how many access group projects should be returned.

value_schema.description: Limit how many access group projects should be returned.

parameters.name: next
parameters.description: Continuation cursor to retrieve the next page of results.

value_schema.description: Continuation cursor to retrieve the next page of results.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: idOrName
parameters.description: The ID or name of the Access Group.

value_schema.description: The ID or name of the Access Group.
